rules_text:
Enchant player [i](they must be the defending player)[/i]
At the beginning of enchanted player’s upkeep, that player puts a stun counter on two untapped lands they control. Put a curse counter on this battle.
rules_text2: Return X target permanent cards from your graveyard and/or exile to your hand, where X is the number of curse counters on this battle as it transformed.
